metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Salina. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Colby A Bertrand, CFPÂ®

heroDescription: Salina, Kansas, a vibrant city in the heart of the Midwest, offers a unique blend of agriculture and manufacturing.
landscapeDescription: Salina's economy is primarily driven by agriculture, manufacturing, and healthcare. The city is strategically located along major highways, enhancing its logistical advantages.
uniqueNeeds: Salina requires support in diversifying its economy and enhancing workforce skills to meet future demands.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Salina's agriculture reliance poses risks from climate change. Housing market stability is crucial; watch for potential price bubbles. Diversify into tech and services.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Salina's economy has shown steady growth, with a focus on manufacturing and agriculture contributing significantly to GDP.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Salina is approximately $50,000, reflecting the city's diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Salina are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment strategies tailored to local industries.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Salina's cost of living remains below the national average, making it an attractive location for families and businesses.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Salina's real estate market is stable, but potential price increases could signal a bubble if not monitored closely.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Salina's business climate is favorable, with incentives for new businesses and a supportive local government.
